column2: Anthrax is a life-threatening infectious disease that normally affects animals
Asthma is a chronic inflammation of the bronchial tubes (airways) that causes swelling and narrowing (constriction) of the airways.
Arthritis is a joint disorder featuring inflammation.
Diarrhea  is an increase in the frequency of bowel movements or a decrease in the form  of stool (greater looseness of stool).
